html:
Shriveling world project

Welcome to the Shriveling world project website

  • The main objective of the project is to develop a functional Shriveling world application
  • The project has a scientific blog dedicated to the representation of geographical time-space
  • The project has a discussion forum dedicated to users
  • The project has a github open for collaboration
  • Bug reports and features requests should be dealt with in the dedicated issue section of GitHub
